dublinCore.dc:title: HR 2576 ENR: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify requirements relating to the availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents, and for other purposes.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday, the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen
form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify requirements relating to the availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents, and for other purposes.

section.header: Availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents
section.text: Section 60102(p) of title 49, United States Code, is amendedâ€”
